chapters.title: Chapter 21: Answering the Summons
chapters.info: Lady Caraline Damodred, p. 414 (468)—Cairhienin noble who made claim to the Sun Throne in Cairhien; she is related to Laman, the last king from House Damodred. She is in league with High Lord Darlin of Tear and Toram Riatin of Cairhien in opposition to Rand.
